verses.text: And the lot of the children of Joseph fell from Jordan \add by\add* Jericho, unto the water of Jericho on the east, \add to\add* the wilderness that goeth up from Jericho throughout mount Beth-el,
and goeth out from Beth-el to Luz, and passeth along unto the borders of Archi \add to\add* Ataroth,
and goeth down westward to the coast of Japhleti, unto the coast of Beth-horon the nether, and to Gezer: and the goings out thereof are at the sea.
So the children of Joseph, Manasseh and Ephraim, took their inheritance.
And the border of the children of Ephraim according to their families was \add thus:\add* even the border of their inheritance on the east side was Ataroth-addar, unto Beth-horon the upper;
and the border went out toward the sea \add to\add* Michmethah on the north side; and the border went about eastward \add unto\add* Taanath-shiloh, and passed by it on the east \add to\add* Janohah;
and it went down from Janohah \add to\add* Ataroth, and to Naarath, and came to Jericho, and went out \add at\add* Jordan.

The border went \add out\add* from Tappuah westward \add unto\add* the river Kanah; and the goings out thereof were at the sea. This \add is\add* the inheritance of the tribe of the children of Ephraim by their families.
And the separate cities for the children of Ephraim \add were\add* among the inheritance of the children of Manasseh, all the cities with their villages.
And they drave not out the Canaanites that dwelt in Gezer: but the Canaanites dwell among the Ephraimites unto this day, and serve under tribute.
